title: Computer Science Visualization Education Based on Hybrid Service Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming concepts and mathematical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Learners focus on understanding real-world applications of computer science as general citizens, with project-based assessments verifying learning outcomes. Conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment, it bridges the gap between theory and practice through hybrid service learning.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their visual thinking skills to apply computer science theories to real-life problems (achieved over 90%)
Learners demonstrate generic skills such as collaboration and problem-solving through project execution (achieved over 80%)
Learners plan and implement service-learning activities in a hybrid environment combining online platforms and offline activities (achieved over 70%)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
